channel.title: Got My First Tattoo UPDATED WITH PICS
channel.description:
I got it last night.
Pics: [img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/8715/tat1qd8.jpg[/img] [img]http://img172.imageshack.us/img172/6745/tat2ee6.jpg[/img]
I got a red and black Hatchet Man on my right bicep.
Pain rating for border- 2/10
Pain Rating for solid, red, 4 needles at a time coloring- 6/10
All in all, it was pretty fun. The guy had a huge portfolio, and he only charged me what I had in my pocket ($44). It wasn't in a shop, but he's opening one in a few months.
I bled a lot. He actually had to wait about an hour after he was finished because a lot of what we thought was ink, was just blood.
It hurts to touch it, and just feels like a bad sun burn.
I have to keep petroleum jelly on it, so that it heals correctly.
Satisfaction- 9/10
It was fucking sweet =)

item.title: Got My First Tattoo UPDATED WITH PICS
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

Hahaha. Read all the new comments that came while I was gone. Sorry about the hair, I had just woke up, its usually… more… out there… Refer to my myspace for more awake pictures. Somethingtohide brought up a good point, and yeah, I think I will. Tattoos are going to be the story of my life.

Read full topic

i odn’t think ill ever get one. they will look bad on me

item.title: Got My First Tattoo UPDATED WITH PICS
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:23, topic:145965”]Not to be rude or mean or anything, but how do you know it’s the best part?

It’s the best part of your life YET.

So next time you have a peak or best part, are you gonna get a tat?[/quote]

thats kinda what i want to do. get tats to signify really important parts of my life. im dont know what is going to be important. but i think i will know when it happens.

Read full topic

item.title: Got My First Tattoo UPDATED WITH PICS
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“Buzzy, post:6, topic:145965”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=199869.msg1777104#msg1777104 date=1190606205]
now when your 75 your going to be pissed at yourself for getting it
[/quote]

That’s not the reason I got it, not to show that I’m a juggalo.

I got it to signify this period of my life.

This is the best part of my life, and I don’t ever want to forget it.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2007, 04:58:36 PM[/size][hr]Posting a pic when my mom gets off the phone.[/quote]

Not to be rude or mean or anything, but how do you know it’s the best part?

It’s the best part of your life YET.

So next time you have a peak or best part, are you gonna get a tat?

Read full topic
